Function Documentation

cache_entry_t* cache_inode_make_root ( cache_inode_fsal_data_t *  pfsdata,
hash_table_t *  ht,
cache_inode_client_t *  pclient,
fsal_op_context_t *  pcontext,
cache_inode_status_t *  pstatus 
)

cache_inode_make_root: Inserts the root of a FS in the cache.

Inserts the root of a FS in the cache. This function will be called at junction traversal.

Parameters:
pfsdata [IN] FSAL data for the root.
ht [IN] hash table used for the cache, unused in this call.
pclient [INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
pcontext [IN] FSAL credentials. Unused here.
pstatus [OUT] returned status.
